channel.title: NSE:KMB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NSE:KMB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kotak Bank Targets India’s Fast-Growing Affluent Customer Pool
item.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. is extending wealth management and bespoke services to its affluent customers as competition for servicing India’s rapidly-growing tribe of rich individuals heats up.
